#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a, int b)
{
	if(b==0)return a;
	return gcd(b, a%b);
}
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int x1,y1,x2,y2;
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		int Dx = abs(x1-x2);
		int Dy = abs(y1-y2);
		int G = gcd(Dx,Dy);
		int dx = Dx/G;
		int dy = Dy/G;
		int ans = (dx-1 + dy-1 + 1)*G;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
